com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth

Class HttpAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth.HttpAccess

  • public class HttpAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic HTTP Access layer - used internally by RestClient and OAuth2. This class watches network changes as well.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HttpAccess.NoNetworkException
      Exception thrown if the device is offline, during an attempted HTTP call.
      static class  HttpAccess.UserAgentInterceptor
      Interceptor that adds user agent header

      • getOkHttpClientBuilder

        @Deprecated
public OkHttpClient.Builder getOkHttpClientBuilder()
        Deprecated. To be removed in 14.0. Please use createNewClientBuilder() instead.
        Returns:
        okHttpClient.Builder with appropriate connection spec and user agent interceptor for an authenticated client.

      • getUnauthenticatedOkHttpBuilder

        @Deprecated
public OkHttpClient.Builder getUnauthenticatedOkHttpBuilder()
        Deprecated. To be removed in 14.0. Please use createNewClientBuilder() instead.
        Returns:
        okHttpClient.Builder with appropriate connection spec and user agent interceptor for an unauthenticated client.

      • createNewClientBuilder

      • getOkHttpClient

        public OkHttpClient getOkHttpClient()
        Returns:

      • hasNetwork

        public boolean hasNetwork()
        Returns the status of network connectivity.
        Returns:
